author: Asjad Hasan
comment: One of the creative and we'll executed watch faces. To the point in terms of information and not trying to do too much. The design itself is sharp and of high quality. Can't recommend enough! Well done.

author: mike m
comment: fake app. does not show up on the watch. malware inside

author: Devin Kolarac
comment: The reinstall worked for those of you who have the same issue of it not showing up. Love the design!

author: Heinz Seijas
comment: Installed app on phone but it's not showing up on Android Wear or the watch? LG urbane

author: jeremy blake
comment: Never showed up in Android wear.

author: Max Gromov
comment: My week start from Sunday.. Can I change it to show first?

reply.author: Studio Yeti
reply.content: Unfortunately, you can not change this. Monday is the first day of the week.

author: Jesse Johnson
comment: Author thinks the week starts on Monday. Get a calendar buddy! Sunday is the first day of the week.

reply.author: Studio Yeti
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. I wrote: There is no option (to change calendar days) in this app - currently. But the calendar works correctly.  I did not mean the first day of the week in the calendar. I meant the design of this watch face.

reply.author: Studio Yeti
reply.content: Please reinstall the NEXO and resync apps (AW/ device settings / connected smartwatch). I tested again - LG AW 2.0 + Samsung Android 7.0. Works fine.
